get.description: This endpoint allows you to **get token price based on the provided token contract address on a network**

parameters.name: addresses
parameters.description: token contract address, comma-separated if more than one token contract address

parameters.name: mcap_fdv_fallback
parameters.description: return FDV if market cap is not available, default: false

parameters.name: include_total_reserve_in_usd
parameters.description: include total reserve in USD, default: false

parameters.name: include_inactive_source
parameters.description: include tokens from inactive pools using the most recent swap, default: false

200.description: Get current USD prices of multiple tokens on a network

parameters.description:

 Example: `base_token` or `base_token,dex`

parameters.name: duration
parameters.description:
duration to sort trending list by 
 Default value: 24h

parameters.name: include_gt_community_data
parameters.description:
include GeckoTerminal community data (Sentiment votes, Suspicious reports) 
 Default value: false

get.description: This endpoint allows you to **query pools based on various filters across all networks on GeckoTerminal**

parameters.name: include
parameters.description:
attributes to include, comma-separated if more than one to include 
 Available values: `base_token`, `quote_token`, `dex`, `network`

parameters.name: networks
parameters.description:
filter pools by networks, comma-separated if more than one 
 Network ID refers to [/networks](/reference/networks-list)

parameters.name: dexes
parameters.description:
filter pools by DEXes, comma-separated if more than one 
 DEX ID refers to [/networks/{network}/dexes](/reference/dexes-list)

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description:
sort the pools by field 
 Default value: h6_trending

parameters.name: fdv_usd_min
parameters.description: minimum fully diluted value in USD

parameters.name: fdv_usd_max
parameters.description: maximum fully diluted value in USD

parameters.name: tx_count_duration
parameters.description:
duration for transaction count metric 
 Default value: 24h

parameters.name: buys_duration
parameters.description:
duration for buy transactions metric 
 Default value: 24h

parameters.name: sells_duration
parameters.description:
duration for sell transactions metric 
 Default value: 24h

parameters.name: checks
parameters.description:
filter options for various checks, comma-separated if more than one 
 Available values: `no_honeypot`, `good_gt_score`, `on_coingecko`, `has_social`

parameters.name: include_unknown_honeypot_tokens
parameters.description: when `checks` includes `no_honeypot`, set to **`true`** to also include 'unknown honeypot' tokens. Default value: `false`

200.description: Get pools based on various filters across all networks

get.description: This endpoint allows you to **search for pools on a network**

parameters.description:
attributes to include, comma-separated if more than one to include 
 Available values: `base_token`, `quote_token`, `dex`

 Default value: 4

get.description: This endpoint allows you to **query 100 most recently updated tokens info of a specific network or across all networks on GeckoTerminal**

parameters.description: Attributes for related resources to include, which will be returned under the top-level 'included' key

parameters.name: network
parameters.description:
filter tokens by provided network 
 *refers to [/networks](/reference/networks-list)

200.description: Get 100 tokens info across all networks ordered by most recently updated

get.summary: ðŸ’¼ Top Token Traders by Token Address
get.description: This endpoint allows you to **query top token traders based on the provided token contract address on a network**

parameters.name: traders
parameters.description:
number of top token traders to return, you may use any integer or `max` 
 Default value: 10

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description:
sort the traders by field 
 Default value: realized_pnl_usd_desc

parameters.name: include_address_label
parameters.description: include address label data, default: false

200.description: Get top token traders for a token

get.summary: ðŸ’¼ Top Token Holders by Token Address
get.description: This endpoint allows you to **query top token holders based on the provided token contract address on a network**

parameters.name: holders
parameters.description:
number of top token holders to return, you may use any integer or `max` 
 Default value: 10

200.description: Get top token holders for a token

get.summary: ðŸ’¼ Historical Token Holders Chart by Token Address
get.description: This endpoint allows you to **get the historical token holders chart based on the provided token contract address on a network**

parameters.name: days
parameters.description:
number of days to return the historical token holders chart 
 Default value: 7

200.description: Get historical token holders chart for a token

get.summary: Pool OHLCV chart by Pool Address
get.description: This endpoint allows you to **get the OHLCV chart (Open, High, Low, Close, Volume) of a pool based on the provided pool address on a network**

parameters.name: aggregate
parameters.description:
time period to aggregate each OHLCV 
 Available values (day): `1` 
 Available values (hour): `1` , `4` , `12` 
 Available values (minute): `1` , `5` , `15` 
 Available values (second): `1`, `15`, `30` 
 Default value: 1

parameters.name: before_timestamp
parameters.description: return OHLCV data before this timestamp (integer seconds since epoch)

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description:
number of OHLCV results to return, maximum 1000 
 Default value: 100

parameters.name: currency
parameters.description:
return OHLCV in USD or quote token 
 Default value: usd

parameters.name: token
parameters.description:
return OHLCV for token 
 use this to invert the chart 
 Available values: 'base', 'quote' or token address 
 Default value: 'base'

parameters.name: include_empty_intervals
parameters.description: include empty intervals with no trade data, default: false

200.description: Get OHLCV data of a pool

get.summary: ðŸ’¼ Token OHLCV chart by Token Address
get.description: This endpoint allows you to **get the OHLCV chart (Open, High, Low, Close, Volume) of a token based on the provided token address on a network**

parameters.name: aggregate
parameters.description:
time period to aggregate each OHLCV 
 Available values (day): `1` 
 Available values (hour): `1` , `4` , `12` 
 Available values (minute): `1` , `5` , `15` 
 Available values (second): `1`, `15`, `30` 
 Default value: 1

parameters.name: before_timestamp
parameters.description: return OHLCV data before this timestamp (integer seconds since epoch)

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description:
number of OHLCV results to return, maximum 1000 
 Default value: 100

parameters.name: currency
parameters.description:
return OHLCV in USD or quote token 
 Default value: usd

parameters.name: include_empty_intervals
parameters.description: include empty intervals with no trade data, default: false

parameters.name: include_inactive_source
parameters.description: include tokens from inactive pools using the most recent swap, default: false

200.description: Get OHLCV data of a token

get.summary: Past 24 Hour Trades by Pool Address
get.description: This endpoint allows you to **query the last 300 trades in the past 24 hours based on the provided pool address**

parameters.name: trade_volume_in_usd_greater_than
parameters.description:
filter trades by trade volume in USD greater than this value 
 Default value: 0

parameters.name: token
parameters.description:
return trades for token 
 use this to invert the chart 
 Available values: 'base', 'quote' or token address 
 Default value: 'base'

200.description: Get last 300 trades in past 24 hours from a pool

get.summary: ðŸ’¼ Past 24 Hour Trades by Token Address
get.description: This endpoint allows you to **query the last 300 trades in the past 24 hours, across all pools, based on the provided token contract address on a network**

parameters.name: trade_volume_in_usd_greater_than
parameters.description:
filter trades by trade volume in USD greater than this value 
 Default value: 0

200.description: Get last 300 trades in past 24 hours from a token

get.description: This endpoint allows you to **query all the supported categories on GeckoTerminal**

parameters.name: sort

sort the categories by field 
 Default value: `h6_volume_percentage_desc`

200.description: Get list of supported categories

get.description: This endpoint allows you to **query all the pools based on the provided category ID**

parameters.name: include

 Example: `base_token` or `base_token,dex`

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description:
sort the pools by field 
 Default value: `pool_created_at_desc`

200.description: Get pools by category ID
